heading: gretzky's swan song?
subheading: with only two games left in the new york rangers season, the question is being asked: is this the end for wayne gretzky, the greatest hockey player in history? speculation has heated up that gretzky, the nhl's all-time leading scorer, will hang up his skates after this season, and the rangers have already been eliminated from playoff contention. there is some reason to believe he will retire; advancing age and lingering injuries definitely slowed the great one during the 1998-99 campaign. but friends say that whatever gretzky plans to do, he isn't talking. yet.
author: wired staff
text: with only two games left in the new york rangers season, the question is being asked: is this the end for wayne gretzky, the greatest hockey player in history? speculation has heated up that gretzky, the nhl's all-time leading scorer, will hang up his skates after this season, and the rangers have already been eliminated from playoff contention. there is some reason to believe he will retire; advancing age and lingering injuries definitely slowed the great one during the 1998-99 campaign. but friends say that whatever gretzky plans to do, he isn't talking. yet.
